snippet: The Yankees had to wait on the outcome of a play-in game between the Orioles and Rangers before they knew they would open the postseason in Baltimore.
abstract: New York Yankees, top seed in the American League, will face Baltimore Orioles in division series playoff; team had to wait on outcome of play-in game between Orioles and Texas Rangers before they knew they would be heading to Baltimore.
lead_paragraph: The Yankees had to wait on the outcome of a play-in game between the Orioles and Rangers before they knew they would open the postseason in Baltimore.

headline.seo: With a Destination of Baltimore Set, So Are the Yankees
headline.main: With a Destination Set, So Are the Yankees
headline.print_headline: With a Destination Set, So Are the Yankees
